name: The Beneath Rooms
description:
This game is a re-imagination of the Backrooms.

It contains 3 Levels, but I would love to do more levels in the future!

Find the exit and you will get to the next level.

PS: When testing the game I always got scared and screamed in fear :<

Story:

They say the beneath rooms are made for the sinners, almost 72% of the people around the world say it's a legend, but in reality, it's not...

Controls:

W A S D to move.

Shift while moving to run.

F: Flashlight.

Tips N' Tricks:

If you hear a loud pitched-down buzzing sound, it means you are near the exit.

Always look behind you!

Make a little mental map in your head when you have to escape.
